org.cds06.speleograph.utils

Class Modification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cds06.speleograph.utils.Modification

  • public class Modification
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Gabriel Augendre. This class is designed to save modifications made to series by giving it a name, a date and the list of the series items before the modification occurs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Modification(java.lang.String name, java.util.Date date, java.util.ArrayList<Item> items, Series series, boolean applyToAll)
      Create a modification saving the series items before the modification was made.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Modification

        public Modification(java.lang.String name,
                    java.util.Date date,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Item> items,
                    Series series,
                    boolean applyToAll)
        Create a modification saving the series items before the modification was made.
        Parameters:
        name - A name for the modification.
        date - The date when the modification was made.
        items - The item list to be saved.
        series - The linked series.
        applyToAll - Intended to say of the modification applies to every series or just one.

        public Series getLinkedSeries()

      • isLike

        public boolean isLike(Modification modif)
        Compares two modifications to say if they are similar. We consider two modifications similar if they are done at the same time (approx., with 3 sec of uncertainty).
        Parameters:
        modif - The modification to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if the modifications are similar, false else.
